3 rois::rois ()
4 {
5  // get rois from incoming event messages
6  int queue_size;
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
8  roi_subscriber = nh.subscribe("bridge/events/roi", queue_size, &rois::roi_callback, this);
9 
10  // import rois from files
11  from_file();
12 }

14 bool rois::get_closest (cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response &res)
15 {
16  cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response closest;
17  cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response response;
18 
19  for (auto roi : regions) {
20  if (roi.second.get_distance(req, response))
21  if (closest.closest_line.size() <= 0 || response.distance < closest.distance)
22  closest = response;
23  else
24  ROS_ERROR("Failed to retrieve distance for ROI %d!", roi.first);
25  }
26 
27  res = closest;
28 
29  return true;
30 }

32 map<int,roi> rois::get_rois ()
33 {
34  return regions;
35 }

37 bool rois::reload (std_srvs::SetBool::Request& req, std_srvs::SetBool::Response& res)
38 {
39  // reset old rois
40  if (req.data)
41  regions.clear();
42 
43  // import rois from files
44  from_file();
45 
46  res.success = true;
47 
48  return true;
49 }

51 void rois::add_roi (vector<geometry_msgs::Point> coords)
52 {
53  if (coords.size() > 3) {
54  roi roi(coords);
55  ROS_INFO("Added ROI #%lu: %lu coordinates", regions.size(), coords.size());
56  regions.emplace(regions.size(), roi);
57  }
58 
59  else {
60  ROS_ERROR("Cannot add ROI %lu, not enough coordinates: %lu", regions.size(), coords.size());
61  }
62 }
63 
64 void rois::from_file ()
65 {
66  // directory with roi coodinate files
67  string roi_dir_str = "";
68  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/roi_dir", roi_dir_str, roi_dir_str);
69 
70  // no roi files
71  if (roi_dir_str.empty()) {
72  ROS_INFO("No directory for ROI files given!");
73  return;
74  }
75 
76  // iterate all files in given directory
77  try {
78  // path relative to this ros package
79  filesystem::path package_dir = package::getPath("area_provider");
80  filesystem::path roi_dir = roi_dir_str;
81  filesystem::path roi_dir_abs = package_dir / roi_dir;
82 
83  // iterate all files
84  for(auto const& roi_file : filesystem::directory_iterator{roi_dir_abs}) {
85  string roi_file_name = roi_file.path().filename().string();
86 
87  try {
88  // convert file contents to json object
89  ifstream roi_stream(roi_file.path().string());
90  json roi_json;
91  roi_stream >> roi_json;
92 
93  // invalid plan file
94  if (roi_json.contains("fileType") == false or roi_json["fileType"] != "Plan") {
95  ROS_ERROR("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: not a qGroundControl plan file!", roi_file_name.c_str());
96  continue;
97  }
98  if (roi_json.contains("mission") == false or roi_json["mission"].contains("items") == false or roi_json["mission"]["items"].size() < 3) {
99  ROS_ERROR("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: no mission specified!", roi_file_name.c_str());
100  continue;
101  }
102 
103  // extract coordinates
104  ROS_DEBUG("Extract ROI coordinates from %s...", roi_file_name.c_str());
105  vector<geometry_msgs::Point> coords;
106  for (auto c : roi_json["mission"]["items"]) {
107  if (c["params"].size() < 7) {
108  ROS_ERROR("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: number of params must be 7!", roi_file_name.c_str());
109  break;
110  }
111  geometry_msgs::Point coord;
112  coord.x = c["params"][4];
113  coord.y = c["params"][5];
114  coord.z = c["params"][6];
115  coords.push_back(coord);
116  }
117 
118  // create roi object
119  ROS_INFO("Add ROI #%lu from file %s", regions.size(), roi_file_name.c_str());
120  add_roi(coords);
121  }
122 
123  catch (json::exception &e) {
124  ROS_DEBUG("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: %s", roi_file_name.c_str(), e.what());
125  }
126  }
127  }
128 
129  catch (filesystem::filesystem_error &e) {
130  ROS_ERROR("Cannot read ROI files from %s: %s", roi_dir_str.c_str(), e.what());
131  }
132 
133  if (regions.size() < 1) {
134  ROS_INFO("No ROIs specified in %s!", roi_dir_str.c_str());
135  }
136 }
137 
138 void rois::roi_callback (const cpswarm_msgs::PointArrayEvent::ConstPtr& event)
139 {
140  // create roi object
141  ROS_INFO("Received ROI #%lu from swarm member %s", regions.size(), event->swarmio.node.c_str());
142  add_roi(event->points);
143 }
